transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello.

Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji Umar sahab baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Aap Umar sahab, mera naam Prashant hai, main IndiaMART office se baat kar raha hun, senior manager.
Customer: Ji boliye.
Executive: Haan, ji ji boliye.
Executive: Ye IndiaMART ki services ke liye call kiya tha maine, aapne customer ke number pe call kiya tha maine.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Haan, to nahi usme jo, hamare paas jo add dalte hain, wo factory walon ka dalte hain khali. Telangana mein Hyderabad hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Aur Madurai. Ye jitne bhi factory wale hain.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Haan factory walon ka address dalte hain mujhe.
Executive: Sir main keh raha hun ki kya dikkat pareshani aa rahi hai sir?
Customer: Kya bhi nahi, do mahine hua ek bhi customer, nahi customer ka dete ya khali factory walon ka. Buylead se related discussion karna tha na.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To aapko buylead kahan ki chahiye sir?
Customer: Hame bhai compulsory bola tha Karnataka ka only karke, mera small scale industries hai.
Executive: Haan mujhe pata hai aapne us din bhi detail bola tha ki small scale industries hai Karnataka ke bahar nahi deal kar sakte. Lekin maine us din bataya tha Karnataka ki ki to lead hi nahi hai sir, pure state ki main check kar raha hun.
Customer: Haan.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Humko nahi hai to humko refund kar do.
Executive: Sir lead to nahi hai aur aapne shayad ye bhi mujhe confirmation diya tha ki chalk ke alawa koi dusra product nahi hai na aapke paas?
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi khulla ek hi chalk piece, jo factory hai wo itna hi bolte hain hum.
Executive: To ek hi matlab product hai chalk. Aur aap jo Karnataka mein deal karte hain.
Customer: Haan, bhai wohi baat karke ye bola tha nahi all over India mein nahi hota ki to transport mein maal toot jata hai. Sir agar buylead wagera thoda bahut bhi ek do buylead available hoti to definitely main try karta ki aapki services mein jitna ho sake utna madad karne ki koshish karta. But maine us din bhi check kiya tha aur aaj bhi check kar pa raha hun koi bhi lead available nahi hai aur jab se aapne services di hai sabse jyada lead bhi nahi consume kar paye hain.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To agar aap refund karne ki baat keh rahe hain to main aapko bata deta hun ki refund ka agar procedure main karwata hun.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: To aapka jo refund hota hai wo pro rata basis pe hota hai. Matlab jaise aapki services jo chali hai, theek hai? Haan, jitne din utne din ka paisa kaat ke phir refund ho jayega. Theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai. To iska process karwaun kya main?
Customer: Haan karwao ji karwao.
Executive: Ah, theek hai main aapko ye bata deta hun. Accha sir ek baat bataiyega aapne jaise thoda bahut kuch lead consume kiya hai. Ah, usme se kuch conversion wagera mila hai kya? Agar mila hai to hum log consider kar lete hain phir usme.
Customer: Nahi ek ek bhi nahi mila ji.
Executive: Haan, ek bhi nahi mila hai. Just ek minute main kuch aur cheeze check kar raha hun, just ek minute. Aapka jo buylead consume kiya hai aapne.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ah, wo aapne Hyderabad ka, Mumbai ka, Kolhapur ka, right? Chennai wagera consume kiya hai.
Customer: Kiya hai lekin sabhi factory wale hain wo.
Executive: Wo parso Kolhapur ka jo pata tha, aap sahi keh rahe hain aap bahar ki bhi buylead consume kar rahe hain na?
Customer: Aapne to bola tha aap nahi ji aap bhej rahe kar ke mujhe consume kiye.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Haan bhai Karnataka ki nahi aa rahi hai. Karnataka ki nahi aa rahi isliye aapne consume kiya hai in sabhi jagahon ki.
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: To main bahar wo hai to bhi bhejte aata karke main bahar bhi consume kiya ji. Haan lekin bahar wala kya bol raha nahi mera bhi factory hai karke bolta wo.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ab wo factory wale ka maal lekar main kya karun? Unki khud ki factory wagera hai. Haan, jinki leads aa bhi rahi hain. Haan, ab main bas ek cheez nahi samajh pa raha hun aap kya bahar deal kar sakte hain? Agar bahar deal kar sakte ho to refund ki zarurat nahi hai. Kyunki tab to thoda bahut kuch leads main dekh pa raha hun jyada to nahi lekin kuch thoda bahut leads ek aad do available hain. Lekin agar aap keval Karnataka mein baat karenge to wahan ki to koi bhi lead nahi hai. To main aapse puchna chahta hun phir se dobara se please clarify kijiye ki aap ah jo abhi matlab refund ki zarurat mehsoos ho rahi hai sir? Kyunki services use karenge to do mahine ke andar hua ek bhi order nahi to aadmi ko kya hona?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To keval phir se clarify kijiye keval Karnataka mein deal karenge usse bahar bhi kar sakte hain?
Customer: Nahi Karnataka pass ji. Bahar bole nahi hota aapka. Haan, bahar kya hota hai sirf baat chit hoti hai.
Executive: Haan aapne bataya tha bahut hi small scale industry hai chhoti moti company hai. Aur aapka aapne ye bhi bola tha ki chalk jo hai kafi ah matlab soft hote hain to wo toot bhi jate hain agar door tak transportation mein kiya to.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai. Aur ye amount bhi bada nahi hota ji. Amount bhi bada nahi hota hai. Aur drop payment bhi aata nahi isko. Haan. Theek hai. Theek hai main baat kar leta hun jaisa bhi rahega main aapko abhi update karwa dunga, theek hai? Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai, theek hai. Thank you, thank you, thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants factory owners' addresses only.

- Customer has not received any orders in 2 months.

- Customer wants a refund if no leads available.

- Customer clarifies he only deals in Karnataka.



Resolution:

- Executive explained refund process on pro-rata basis.

- Executive checked lead consumption, found outside Karnataka.

- Executive clarified customer's ability to deal outside Karnataka.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will update the customer later.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, refund, karnataka, factory owners
